rows: After an incoming flow is activated, theWait for messageintermediate event waits until a specific message is generated by aThrow messageintermediate event within the same process.
When the message is received by theWait for messageevent, it activates its outgoing flows.
html:
Activation

After an incoming flow is activated, the Wait for message intermediate event waits until a specific message is generated by a Throw message intermediate event within the same process.

Execution

When the message is received by the Wait for message event, it activates its outgoing flows.
